.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-vkGetBufferMemoryRequirements2-device-parameter]] pname:device must: be a valid sname:VkDevice handle

* [[VUID-vkGetBufferMemoryRequirements2-pMemoryRequirements-parameter]] pname:pMemoryRequirements must: be a valid pointer to a sname:VkMemoryRequirements2 structure
